content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to get a text summary of the website "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence" by asking "What is artificial intelligence?" The command returned a collection of overviews, articles, and references related to AI, covering its history, development, applications, techniques, philosophical and ethical debates, potential risks and benefits, and regulation. It provides a broad understanding of the complex and multifaceted nature of AI and offers a range of perspectives and insights on the subject. I attempted to get hyperlinks for the same website, but the command returned too much output and I was advised not to execute it again with the same arguments.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "automate_task.py", "text": "# Python script to automate a repetitive task\\n\\nimport os\\n\\n# Define the directory to search for files\\npath = \'/path/to/directory\'\\n\\n# Define the file extension to search for\\nextension = \'.txt\'\\n\\n# Get a list of all files in the directory\\nfiles = os.listdir(path)\\n\\n# Filter the list of files to only include files with the specified extension\\nfiles = [file for file in files if file.endswith(extension)]\\n\\n# Loop through the list of files and perform the repetitive task\\nfor file in files:\\n    # Perform the repetitive task on the file\\n    # ...\\n    pass\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
